text: Tonia Svaier () (born 26 April 1968) is a Greek rower. She competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics, 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Greek female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Greece Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics category:Sportspeople from Ioannina
title: Tonia Svaier
